definition[0]: to move into a comfortable position, pressing your head or body against someone or against something soft
example[0]: Sarah lay there peacefully, the child nestling by her side.
example[1]: He nestled his head against her shoulder.
definition[1]: to be surrounded by something, especially hills or countryside
example[2]: a tiny village nestling among the foothills of the French Alps
definition[2]: a large international company that makes Nescaf√© coffee and milk-based products such as chocolate and baby milk
